name: Pony Horse Riding 3D
description:
Dive into peaceful countryside atmosphere riding a little pony hose! Sit right on the horseback and enjoy amazing views of blooming fields and meadows!

Pony Horse Riding 3D brings you into a world that you won’t want to leave! Feel the atmosphere of magical world inhabited by pony horses, pegasus and unicorns! Explore blooming meadows with rainbows and enjoy amazing countryside scenery! Try new 3D pony simulator – complete different tasks collecting food and jumping over obstacles! It’s so real, seem like you are sitting on a pony horseback! Ride your pony through valleys and meadows, earn points and upgrade its skills. Bring up your own pony from little foal to adult horse! More funny tricks, new challenging missions and even more for your joy! Great pony horse simulator for all girls and boys! Start your own countryside adventure with Pony Horse Riding 3D simulator, but don’t forget to comb pony’s tail before you start! If you are a big fan of horse simulators - come on and don’t miss to play this pony game!

Enter into the beautiful environments – meadows, valleys and green fields! Feel like a real pony rider siting on a horseback! Look at this magical world through the eyes of cute little pony and you will surely love it! Choose your favorite pony with unique tail and mane color and bring it up from a little foal to an adult pony horse! Complete tasks riding fast, find something to eat and meet other animals (even pegasus and unicorns) to make friends with them! Upgrade pony’s skills to make it faster or jump higher. Train your little pony horse to make it the best! What is the main dream of all girls? To have a little pony, of course! Play Pony Horse Riding 3D and make your dreams come true! Keep the tail pipe and start your own magical adventure!

Pony Horse Riding 3D features:

- Explore picturesque valleys as a pony horse
- Bring your pony up from a little foal to adult pony horse
- Ride fast to upgrade your skills
- Choose your own pony – tail and mane color and even more!

Jump and run your pony with a joystick! Select your pony horse style and enter magic world full of beautiful landscapes! Find vegetables and fruit to eat, do tricks and have fun living the life of little pony horse! Ever dreamed of having a pony or a unicorn then you were a little boy or a girl? Enjoy Pony Horse Riding 3D game – great pony simulator for all animals’ lovers! Make your pony the fastest just to tell your friends - My pony is the best!
